articles.author: GIADA ZAMPANO, SYLVIA HUI
articles.title: Thousands join pro-Palestinian rallies around the globe as Oct. 7 anniversary nears - The Associated Press
articles.description: Police used tear gas and water cannons to disperse violent demonstrators in Rome as tens of thousands pro-Palestinian protesters took to the streets in European cities and around the globe, calling for a cease-fire as the first anniversary of the Hamas attack…
articles.content: ROME (AP) Police used tear gas and water cannons to disperse violent demonstrators in Rome as tens of thousands of pro-Palestinian protesters took to the streets in major European cities and around t… [+6822 chars]
